oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Municipal waste composts in organic agriculture, aiming to the future
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Tontti, Tiina
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Composting and manuring
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Finnish study shows possibilities for using high quality municipal waste composts as fertilizers without any negative effects on soil heavy metals, hygienic quality or microbiological functions.
